articles.title: Greetings to Serbian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Serbian President

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Boris Tadic, President of Serbia, on October 30 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Serbia.
						 Noting that the two countries have developed on good terms the friendly and cooperative relations on the principles of respect for sovereignty, equality and mutual benefits since the establishment of their diplomatic ties, Kim in the message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship between the two countries would continue to expand and strengthen in the interests of the two peoples in the future, too.

articles.title: New Cabinet Decisions Adopted
articles.content:
New Cabinet Decisions Adopted

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- Cabinet decisions on the regulations of public services and of the enforcement of the social security law have of late been adopted in the DPRK. 
						According to the decisions, these regulations are intended to meet the demands of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state in their policy for modernizing the public service networks and regularly operating them and to correctly implement the social security policy and law of the state and establish a more strict system and order in the organization and management of the public service networks and in the social security work.
						
						The regulations expound in detail questions of principle in putting more punch into the organization and management of the public service networks, their sanitary control and property and financial management and guidance and control of the networks. 
						
						Also laid down in detail are questions of principle and methods to be observed in improving the social security work such as the recipients  of social security allowances and their standards, their preferential treatment, social security procedures, disbursement of social security fund, organization and management of social security organs, production and supply by subsidiary mechanism.
						
						With the adoption of the resolutions, a firm guarantee has been provided to meet better the growing demand of the people and convenience in their life and enable the welfare recipients to enjoy greater benefits of social security at the expense of the state by steadily consolidating and developing the social security system.

articles.title: Iranian National Youth Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Iranian National Youth Delegation Arrives

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the National Youth Organization of Iran led by its Head Mohammad Javad Haji Ali Akbari, vice-president of Iran, arrived here today.
						 The delegation was greeted at the airport by Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, and officials concerned and Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung by Iranians

					
						 Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the National Youth Organization of Iran visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill today to pay tribute to him. 
						 The guests placed a floral basket before the statue in profound reverence for the President and made bows to him.

articles.title: National Scientific and Technological Public Presentation and Exhibition Held
articles.content:
National Scientific and Technological Public Presentation and Exhibition Held

					
						 Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological public presentation and exhibition in the field of Koryo medicine took place at the Grand People's Study House on Nov. 4 and 5.
						 Scientists, technicians and university teachers in the field attending the public presentation heard many papers, and extracted Koryo medicine, capsular substance and others were on display at the exhibition. 
						
						 Introduced at the presentation were precious achievements and experience gained in raising the efficacy of Koryo medicine through an extracting process, sterilizing the pharmaceutical process and cultivating medicinal herbs. 
						
						 Appreciated by the participants were successes made in establishing a new process of obtaining the extract of medicinal herbs for the manufacture of Koryo medicine, applying a new method of obtaining extract of ginkgo leaves and manufacturing medicine from it, etc.

articles.title: Time-honored Temples in Korea
articles.content:
Time-honored Temples in Korea

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- The construction of temples in Korea began in the period of the three kingdoms when Buddhism found its way into them and it continued throughout the Middle Ages.
						 Though the temples were degraded in the period of the Ri dynasty when Confucianism was encouraged and Buddhism was rejected, the management and construction of temples were carried on to some extent. That is why temples hold a considerable part in the architectural heritages of Korea.
						
						 The temple consists of a building for the Buddhist idol and worship and a building for the daily and religious life of priests.
						
						 The former is called puljon (the house of the Buddhist idol), typical of which is Taeung Hall (the building containing idol of Sakyamuni), Kukrak Hall or Muryangsu Hall (the building for the idol of Amitabha) and so on.
						
						 Hanging on walls of the buildings were Buddhist paintings commensurate with the names of the houses and character of the Buddhist idols.
						
						 From the period of the three kingdoms to the end of later Silla, buildings were arranged symmetrically on both sides of the gate, the pagoda and the main Buddhist hall. But from the end of later Silla through Koryo to the Ri dynasty, pavilions, pagodas and main Buddhist halls were built in the center of the temple and other buildings were arranged freely according to the topography with temples built mainly in mountains.
						
						 And the decorations of the pillar supporting device were simple at the end of Koryo and beginning of the Ri dynasty as in case with the existing Ungjin Hall of the Songbul Temple and Pokwang Hall of the Yonthansimwon Temple, but they were gorgeous and conspicuous from the middle of the Ri dynasty as can be seen in the Pokwang Hall of the Chonju Temple.
						
						 The formative artistic pieces used in the temples give glimpses of the emotion of the Korean people and their excellent and peculiar talents.
						
						 For this reason, the temple buildings and relics in them are of great significance in the study of the history of the development of architecture, painting, sculpture, etc. in the Middle Ages, and they are precious national treasures.

articles.title: DPRK Advances into Quarterfinals of 2008 U-19 Asian Football Confederation Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Advances into Quarterfinals of 2008 U-19 Asian Football Confederation Championships

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team advanced into quarterfinals of the 2008 Under-19 Asian Football Confederation Championships under way in Saudi Arabia.
						 A match between the DPRK and the Chinese teams belonging to Group C of the group league matches of the championships took place on Nov. 5. It ended in 0-0 draw.
						
						 The DPRK team acquired a total of five points in three matches, one win and two draws, thus advancing into quarterfinals of the championships.

articles.title: Songun Politics Praised by Myanmar Politician
articles.content:
Songun Politics Praised by Myanmar Politician

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- Aung Thein Lynn, mayor of Yangon City, Myanmar who is chairman of the Yangon City Development Committee, said after visiting the DPRK that he was deeply impressed by the Korean people who are dynamically advancing under the banner of Songun. 
						 Noting that Kim Jong Il is victoriously leading the Korean people in their struggle to build a great prosperous powerful nation with his Songun leadership, he added:
						
						 The DPRK is now displaying its might as an invincible military power. 
						
						 The DPRK which was founded thanks to the efforts of the armed forces and people has settled all its issues in reliance upon its revolutionary armed forces. 
						
						 It is entirely ascribable to the Songun leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the eternal sun of Juche, and Kim Jong Il who is successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the cause of the President. 
						
						 Kim Jong Il is the great brilliant commander endowed with matchless pluck and guts. 
						
						 The DPRK is pushing forward the revolution and construction on the principles of giving importance and priority to military affairs under his leadership. 
						
						 The achievements made by the Korean people in boosting the national defence capability go to prove the great vitality of the Songun politics. 
						
						 It is my belief that the Korean people would surely build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who is pursuing unique Songun politics.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Solicitation Diplomacy Ridiculed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Solicitation Diplomacy Ridiculed

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak was busy with solicitation diplomacy at the recent Asia-Europe summit. He implored delegates to "cooperate in the efforts to pressurize the north to dismantle nukes as early as possible so that it may join the international community." Earlier, the minister of "Planning and Finance" of south Korea at an international meeting solicited "a positive role and support for reform and opening in the north."
						 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
						
						 Such reckless remarks made by the group of traitors asking for "cooperation and support" from outside forces in the international arena are, in essence, aimed at building an international cooperation system targeted against the DPRK.
						
						 These moves are a revelation of the Lee group's sinister attempt to lay a political and military siege to the DPRK on an international scale with the help of outside forces and stifle it at any cost.
						
						 The group's hectic solicitation diplomacy for international cooperation aimed at negating the dignity of the DPRK and its system and stirring up the atmosphere of confrontation with it would only further bedevil the north-south relations, far from helping improve them, and lead to a war in the end.
						
						 Absolutely intolerable are the moves of the Lee group to bring the inter-Korean relations to collapse, escalate confrontation and invite a war disaster in league with outside forces as all the Koreans are now working hard to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity by their concerted efforts, rejecting outside forces, in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
						
						 The Lee group will only face a severe judgment by history and the nation if it keeps to the road of confrontation in pursuance of its foolish ambition, backed by outside forces.
						
						 The south Korean conservative ruling forces would be well advised to behave themselves, lending an ear to the repeated warnings of the DPRK.

articles.title: Imperialists' Sophism about "Human Rights" and "Democracy" Dismissed
articles.content:
Imperialists' Sophism about "Human Rights" and "Democracy" Dismissed

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- "Protection of human rights" and "democracy" touted by the imperialist reactionaries are nothing but sophism to cover up their moves for interference and domination over other countries.
						 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article.
						
						 It goes on:
						
						 It is ridiculous, indeed, for the imperialists to oft-repeat "protection of human rights" and "democracy" for the purpose of meeting their selfish aim, without having proper knowledge about genuine human rights and democracy.
						
						 It is the capitalist countries where human rights are most wantonly violated. The popular masses in those countries are denied any political rights and freedom and the gap between the rich and the poor is widening as the days go by. 
						
						 In those countries the people are subject to imprisonment for demanding democratic freedom and rights. Due to the prevalence of the reactionary ideas and culture the people are spiritually and culturally deformed and fall victim to violence.
						
						 Socialist democracy is the only genuine democracy in the world. Socialist democracy helps the popular masses emerge masters of the state and society and fully exercise their rights as masters in all fabrics of social life.
						
						 The U.S. is so foolish as to dare find fault with the DPRK over "human rights issue" and do harm to it, the article notes, and goes on:
						
						 The ulterior aim of the U.S. imperialists is to damage the international prestige of the DPRK over the "human rights issue in the north", internationalize their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and secure a pretext to launch a military aggression against it. 
						
						 There has been no human rights issue in the DPRK and it cannot exist there. 
						
						 The desperate efforts on the part of the U.S. to do harm to the DPRK through a "human rights" offensive would only reinforce the anti-U.S. sentiment of the Korean people and their spirit of defending socialism in every way.
						
						 The world progressive people should clearly see through the hypocritical and dangerous nature of the imperialists' loudmouthed "protection of human rights" and "democracy" and wage a vigorous struggle for frustrating their criminal artifice.

articles.title: GNP's Trumpeting about "Human Rights Issue in North" Slammed
articles.content:
GNP's Trumpeting about "Human Rights Issue in North" Slammed

					
						 Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- Coteries of the Grand National Party of south Korea including Pak Hui Thae let loose a spate of jargons over "the human rights issue in the north," echoing the words uttered by riff-raffs of some other country at a recent "general meeting." This comes under fire by a signed commentary of Minju Joson today.
						 Their outbursts are a deliberate provocation getting on the nerves of the army and people of the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
						
						 There has been no "human rights issue" and it can never exist under the socialist system in the DPRK where all state policies and activities are aimed to protect the sovereign rights and dignity of human beings.
						
						 The GNP gentries are letting loose jargons about the "human rights issue in the north" in collusion with riff-raffs of other country though they are in such a pretty fix that they can hardly settle their own problem. How shameless and ridiculous they are. Their behavior is intolerable as it is a deliberate act to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen, totally block the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and further bedevil the inter-Korean relations. 
						
						 All the fellow countrymen wish to see the earliest improvement of the north-south relations which has been put at the lowest ebb by the Lee Myung Bak group's treacherous and anti-reunification moves. 
						
						 However, the Lee group is still persisting in its reckless acts of bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and stoking enmity and distrust between compatriots without hesitation, utterly indifferent to the desire of the fellow countrymen. The ruckus kicked up by the GNP gentries over the "human rights issue in the north" is part of such moves. This once again clearly proves that the GNP is a group of traitors and anti-reunification elements seeking not national reconciliation and unity and reunification, but confrontation with the north and permanent division and a war. 
						
						 The GNP's desperate efforts to prevent the inter-Korean relations from improving and escalate the confrontation with the north and the moves for a war against it would only give further momentum to the nationwide anti-Lee Myung Bak, anti-GNP struggle. 
						
						 The Lee group had better bear this in mind and stop peddling "the human rights issue in the north," a factor of deteriorating the inter-Korean relations, and mind its own business.

articles.title: Foolish Remarks of Minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade" of S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
Foolish Remarks of Minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade" of S. Korea under Fire

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- Minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade" of south Korea Ryu Myong Hwan, speaking at the recent "inspection of administration at the National Assembly" blustered that the delisting of the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism" might be retracted while talking this or that about the substance of the nuclear declaration submitted by the north.
						Minju Joson today observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard: 
						
						 It was impertinent for Ryu to dare pull up compatriots. Behaving as if he were U.S. Secretary of State, Ryu was so imprudent as to talk about the retraction of the U.S. delisting the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism." He is no more than marionette acting at the instructions of Lee Myung Bak as he does not know where he stands.
						
						 His impertinent foolish remarks reveal the displeasure of traitor Lee with the behavior of his American master.
						
						 As far as Lee is concerned, he is a traitor who considers confrontation with fellow countrymen as a means of existence.
						
						 "No nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" which Lee advocated as his "policy towards the north" are aimed at doing harm to compatriots with the help of the U.S.
						
						 No wonder, Lee must be disagreeable with the above-said action taken by the U.S. That was why Lee instructed Ryu to talk such rubbish as the former's far-fetched assertion might incur the displeasure of his American master. Ryu said this or that about the U.S. attitude, unaware of its possible fatal consequences. What a wretched guy he is.
						
						 The Lee Myung Bak group is committing wrongs, unnecessarily poking its nose into other's business. This is as foolish an act as adding fuel to the nationwide anti-Lee Myung Bak struggle.
						
						 The nation will surely force the Lee group to pay for its crimes as it is going more reckless, heated with the fever of confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Large-scale Peasants' Struggle Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Large-scale Peasants' Struggle Declared in S. Korea

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- 32 peasants organizations including the south Korean Federation of Peasant Associations and the Central Association of Agricultural Managers of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 3 at which they declared a large-scale peasants' struggle against the conclusion of the south Korea-U.S. FTA.
						 Accusing the "government" and the "Grand National Party" of working hard to submit the "motion calling for the ratification of the FTA" to the "National Assembly", they declared that peasants throughout south Korea would simultaneously launch a large-scale struggle in Seoul on Nov. 25.
						
						 The above-said bodies urged the "government" to dismiss the government officials who expropriated subsidies for rice cultivators and take an immediate step to guarantee the vital rights of the peasants.

articles.title: Anti-U.S. and Anti-War Struggle Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-U.S. and Anti-War Struggle Called for in S. Korea

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations including the south Korean emergency measure committee to shatter the moves to retaliate against the candlelight actions, the plot to scrap the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and the move to fabricate a case against the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration held the 200th anti-U.S. and anti-war Friday rally for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea in Seoul on Oct. 31.
						 The appeal made public at the rally deplored that though civic and public bodies have held Friday rallies in front of the U.S. embassy in Seoul, chanting slogans calling for actions against the U.S. and war and for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces since 2003, the U.S. is still persisting in its moves to unleash a war of aggression against the north and GIs' crimes are reported in an unbroken chain on this land.
						
						 The appeal also accused the U.S. of upgrading the "CONPLAN 5029", the scenario to invade the north, into an "OPLAN" under the pretext of coping with the "contingency in the north" and staging the Hoguk exercises, the large-scale war maneuvers aimed at invading it, in all parts of south Korea.
						
						 The life and security of the south Korean people are being seriously threatened by the U.S. moves to mount a preemptive attack on the north and rampant GIs' crimes, the appeal noted, and continued:
						
						 The reality clearly proves that the U.S. forces present in south Korea are no more than a cancer-like entity as they escalate the tensions on the Korean Peninsula and bring about a war and in order to establish a genuine peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean Peninsula it is necessary to force the U.S. forces to withdraw from south Korea.
						
						 It is necessary to carve out the future of a reunified country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans, the appeal said, urging all the people to vigorously turn out in the struggle against the U.S. and war and for the pullback of the U.S. forces from south Korea in order to drive the U.S. troops out of south Korea and achieve peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Halt to Joint War Maneuvers Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Joint War Maneuvers Urged in S. Korea

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- Different circles of south Korea are demanding the halt to the aggressive Hoguk joint war exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet war maniacs.
						 The emergency measure committee to shatter the moves to retaliate against the candlelight actions, the plot to scrap the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and the move to fabricate a case against the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration made public a statement on Oct. 31 in which it disclosed that through the current exercises the warlike forces are going to upgrade the "CONPLAN 5029" the core of which is preemptive attack on the DPRK into an "OPLAN."
						
						 The statement branded such reckless action as a dangerous act of escalating confrontation and tension in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
						
						 The United States and the south Korean authorities should stop the war exercises at once, squarely seeing the catastrophic results their confrontational war maneuvers against the DPRK will bring to this land, it urged.
						
						 In the meantime, the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and other organizations held a joint press conference in denunciation of the reckless joint military maneuvers of the bellicose forces. 
						
						 Speakers at the press conference said that the ongoing war games under the pretext of coping with any "sudden situation" in the DPRK are undisguised and dangerous anti-DPRK war maneuvers the keynote of which is that the south Korea-U.S. "combined forces" advance northward under the commandership of the U.S. in case of "emergency."
						
						 They strongly demanded an immediate halt to such military action of hostility towards the DPRK.

articles.title: Japan's Suppression of Chongryon under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Suppression of Chongryon under Fire

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- Pak Chang Gil, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), called a press conference at the hall of the Korean workers in commerce in Tokyo on Oct. 31 and made public a statement denouncing the Japanese authorities for their reckless and politically-motivated crackdown upon organizations of Chongryon and the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan.
						 The statement referred to the fact that the public security department of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Office on Oct. 29 searched the Shinjuku, Tokyo Metropolis, Association of Korean Traders and Industrialists in Japan and other institutions under Chongryon on charges of "violation of the law on taxation".
						
						 This is one more politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon committed under the Aso regime as it is part of the measures taken to apply sanctions against the DPRK and continuation of the search moves conducted in Hyogo, Hokkaido, Kyoto and other areas since 2006, the statement pointed out.
						
						 It demanded that the Japanese authorities stop the unreasonable search for Chongryon and the association, return all seized things and ensure the right of Korean residents and commercial workers in Japan to business and their vital rights.

articles.title: Hoguk Joint War Exercises Flayed in UK
articles.content:
Hoguk Joint War Exercises Flayed in UK

					
						Pyongyang, November 6 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Oct. 31 denouncing the aggressive and provocative Hoguk joint war exercises launched by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warlike forces.
						 The statement said that the above-said exercises with huge armed forces including U.S. marines involved are preliminary war maneuvers aimed at invading the DPRK and destroying socialism centered on the popular masses and extremely adventurous and provocative saber-rattling that may develop into a nuclear war in the light of their nature.
						
						 Through these war exercises the U.S. seeks to bring socialist Korea to its knees by stifling and threatening it and find a pretext to further strain the situation, the statement noted, and went on: 
						
						 This self-exposed that the U.S. is not interested in defusing the tension on the Korean Peninsula at all.
						
						 The Lee Myung Bak clique of south Korea should drop at once the sycophancy and servile spirit and stop the war exercises against compatriots, the drills for using its troops as cannon fodder of the U.S. imperialists. 
						
						 We demand the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique immediately stop the war exercises.
						
						 We solemnly declare that we stand on the same front with the people of dignified Korea of Juche under socialism centered on the popular masses.

articles.title: Aprobadas nuevas resoluciones del Consejo de Ministros
articles.content:
Aprobadas nuevas resoluciones del Consejo de Ministros

					
						Pyongyang, 6 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, quedaron aprobadas nuevas resoluciones del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre las reglas de servicio publico y las de la ejecucion de la ley de jubilacion.
						Segun los documentos, estas reglas fueron establecidas para ejecutar de modo correcto la demanda politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado de modernizar las redes de servicio publico y gestionarlas normalmente, la politica y la ley del pais sobre la jubilacion y para establecer estrictamente el sistema y el orden en la organizacion y administracion de estas redes y en la jubilacion.
						
						Las reglas dilucidan en detalles los problemas de principio que se presentan en la organizacion, la administracion, la condicion higienica, la administracion de bienes y finanzas de las redes en cuestion y la direccion y el control sobre estas redes.
						
						Ademas, mencionan detalladamente los problemas de principio y los metodos que se deberan mantener en hacer bien la jubilacion entre otros, el objeto y norma de paga de jubilacion, la atencion preferencial de los jubilados, el procedimiento y el egreso de jubilacion, la organizacion y la administracion del organo de jubilacion y la produccion y el suministro de su organizacion auxiliar.
						
						La aprobacion de dichas reglas fomenta mas la creciente demanda y la comodidad de vida de los habitantes, y al desarrollar sin cesar el sistema de jubilacion, preparo la firme garantia para brindar a los jubilados los beneficios de esta rama a expensas del estado.

articles.title: Personalidad de Myanmar elogia la politica de Songun de Corea
articles.content:
Personalidad de Myanmar elogia la politica de Songun de Corea

					
						Pyongyang, 6 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Aung Thein Lynn, alcalde de Yangon y presidente del Comite de Desarrollo de esta ciudad de Myanmar quien visito a Corea, senalo que  quedo emocionado por el aspecto del pueblo coreano que avanza vigorosamente bajo la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar) y continuo:
						Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il orienta a la victoria la lucha del pueblo coreano por la construccion de una gran potencia prospera aplicando la direccion mediante el Songun.
						
						Hoy dia, Corea manifiesta su poderio de invencible potencia militar.
						
						La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fundada por el fusil y las fuerzas del pueblo ha venido solucionando todos los problemas pendientes apoyandose en sus propias fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
						
						Esto se debe enteramente a la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, eterno Sol de Juche y a la direccion de Songun de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il quien continua brillantemente la causa del Presidente.
						
						Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il es el insigne comandante con audacia y decision incomparables.
						
						Bajo su direccion, en Corea se aceleran la revolucion y la construccion sobre el principio de dar importancia a los asuntos militares y de anteponerlos a otros problemas.
						
						Los exitos del pueblo coreano en el fortalecimiento del poderio de defensa nacional comprueban la inagotable vitalidad de la politica de Songun.
						
						Estamos seguros de que en pleno acato a la direccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il quien practica la original politica de Songun, el pueblo coreano construira sin falta la gran potencia prospera socialista.

articles.title: En Pyongyang la delegacion de organizacion de la juventud de Iran
articles.content:
En Pyongyang la delegacion de organizacion de la juventud de Iran

					
						Pyongyang, 6 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Llego el dia 6 a esta capital la delegacion de la organizacion nacional de la juventud de Iran presidida por su presidente Mohammad Javad Haji Ali Akbari, quien es vicepresidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran.
						En el aeropuerto la delegacion fue acogida por el primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung Ri Yong Chol, y otros funcionarios interesados asi como el embajador iranio en Corea Morteza Moradian.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena al ministro de "relaciones exteriores y comercio"
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena al ministro de "relaciones exteriores y comercio"

					
						Pyongyang, 6 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, en una "inspeccion parlamentaria de los asuntos estatales" el ministro de las "relaciones exteriores y comercio" del Sur de Corea Ryu Myong Hwan hablo de que "la eliminacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de la lista de los paises que apoyan al terrorismo podra volver al estado original" al cabo de cuestionar el "contenido de la declaracion nuclear del Norte de Corea".
						Tal disparate de Ryu que se comporta como si fuera el secretario de Estado estadounidense no puede menos de ser un acto insolente.
						
						 Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 6 y continua:
						
						 Ryu Myong Hwan que no sabe su posicion, no pasa de ser un acolito de Lee Myun Bak.
						
						 Su tonteria refleja la intencion incomoda del traidor Lee a quien no gusta el comportamiento de su amo norteamericano.
						
						 Lee es el traidor que se entrega solo a la confrontacion con los connacionales.
						
						 El traidor Lee salio con la "politica sobre el Norte de Corea" cuya esencia es la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura  y 3,000 dolares" con el fin de danar a los connacionales al apoyarse en las fuerzas de EE.UU.. Pero,  este elimino el Norte de Corea de la lista de los paises que apoyan al terrorismo". !Que penaria Lee por el respecto!. El no tiene remedio. Por esta razon, el traidor escenifico la farsa de presentar a su lacayo Ryu.
						
						 Sin embargo, Ryu vocifero de tal o cual manera en cuanto a la conducta de EE.UU. sin saber su posicion.  Es muy lamentable.
						
						 La intervencion abierta de la banda de Lee en los asuntos de otros es la autodestruccion para acelerar la lucha nacional contra Lee Myung Bak.
						
						 El crimen de la banda de Lee que se afana en la confrontacion con los connacionales sera contado sin falta.
